trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderImageMargin%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderToolStripBorder%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderToolStripBackground%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderImageMargin%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderToolStripBorder%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderToolStripBackground%2A?displayProperty=fullName> métodos.

trans-unit.source: The ToolStripRenderEventArgs class also provides data for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawImageMargin%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawToolStripBorder%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawToolStripBackground%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: A classe ToolStripRenderEventArgs também fornece dados para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawImageMargin%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawToolStripBorder%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawToolStripBackground%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawToolStripBackground%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawToolStripBorder%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawImageMargin%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs"></xref> class for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> and using the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs"> </xref> classe especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> e usando especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to use for painting.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> usada para pintura.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> to paint.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> para pintar.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs"></xref> class for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>, using the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to paint the specified bounds with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs"> </xref> classe especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>, usando especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> para pintar os limites especificados com especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to use for painting.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> usada para pintura.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> to paint.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> para pintar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> representing the bounds of the area to be painted.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa os limites da área de pintura.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that the background of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> is painted with.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> que o plano de fundo do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> é pintado com.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> representing the bounds of the area to be painted.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa os limites da área de pintura.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> representing the bounds of the area to be painted.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa os limites da área de pintura.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that the background of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> is painted with.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> que o plano de fundo do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> é pintado com.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that the background of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> is painted with.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> que o plano de fundo do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> é pintado com.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> representing the overlap area between a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> and its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.OwnerItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa a área de sobreposição entre uma <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> e sua <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.OwnerItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> is not a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.OwnerItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is `null`, the ConnectedArea property returns an empty <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>não é um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.OwnerItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName>é `null`, a propriedade ConnectedArea retorna vazio <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>.</xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.OwnerItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> representing the overlap area between a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> and its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.OwnerItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa a área de sobreposição entre uma <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> e sua <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.OwnerItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> usados para pintar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> usados para pintar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> to be painted.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> pintadas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> to be painted.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> pintadas.
